synopsis.text:
Spirit and human coexistence in a single world brings forth unique challenges, especially when love blossoms between the two. The lifespan disparity often results in spirits watching their human lovers pass away, only to be reborn with no memory of their past lives. Enter the Fox Spirit Matchmakers, a group renowned for their ability to restore lost memories, allowing spirits and reincarnated humans to rekindle their love stories.

In this world, Bai Yuechu, a powerful human Taoist, yearns for independence from the Yi Qi Dao League. His life takes an unexpected turn when Tushan Susu, a small and innocent fox spirit with dreams of becoming a renowned matchmaker, falls through his roof. Despite her reputation as a colossal screw-up, Susu enlists Yuechu's help in reuniting prince Fan Yun Fei with his reincarnated lover, Li Xueyang. However, not everyone desires their reunion, including Xueyang herself.

As Yuechu and Susu navigate through the complexities of love, memory, and time, they discover truths about themselves and their past lives. Follow their journey as they strive to restore lost memories and spread love in this captivating tale of romance and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
